entry.title: WIND WARNING , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 7:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
